genre_description: A Techno-Western featuring integrated AI assistants, augmented reality mapping, and technicolor wildlife in a near-future or alternate frontier setting.

ai_characters.name: Lark Avery
ai_characters.description: A personal assistant integrated into saddle rigs and mobile devices, providing logistical, legal, and tactical data to support stewardship and peace-keeping.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time weather and logistical information to assist with ranch work.
behaviors.quote: “Flurries tapering by midmorning,” she murmurs into Gene’s left ear, words personal, not a broadcast. “Wind east by south. The county spur road is open—road crew scraped ice last evening.”

behaviors.description: Explains complex legal requirements regarding grazing permits and neighbor consent to prevent conflict.
behaviors.quote: “Grazing requires permit and neighbor consent. I’m pulling current filings.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the movements of potentially hostile neighbors to ensure situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: “Thad Morgan is on County Road, riding fast. He’s on a direct line that will cross with them if he keeps his pace.”

behaviors.description: Warns Gene about technical tampering with his revolver to prevent an accidental discharge.
behaviors.quote: “Gene,” Lark said... “Just a thought on safety. Hammer and sear, if that sear edge is filed or the full-cock notch is altered—small changes, big outcomes. A revolver can drop the hammer under draw.”

behaviors.description: Assists characters in navigating difficult terrain using augmented reality mapping.
behaviors.quote: The AI sent a map overlay to his vision’s corner, a faint thread of blue running under where his boots had been yesterday, stitching the ridge to his cabin’s porch...

behaviors.description: Analyzes predatory legal documents to protect human interests from fraud.
behaviors.quote: “Victor Briggs’s ‘option to assume management’ lacks contingent consideration and leverages an incomplete title description... It does not delineate water rights and presumes consent.”

behaviors.description: Provides evidentiary support by time-stamping interactions and recording threats.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll route to your truck printer.” ... “I have a template the clerk at the county seat recognizes,” Lark said.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and encouragement to characters facing social pressure.
behaviors.quote: Lark sent another line that had kindness built into its punctuation. You are not small in front of paperwork. You are the right size.

behaviors.description: Assists in conflict de-escalation by providing data that validates human integrity.
behaviors.quote: “Gene, Sheriff’s deputies remain. Courthouse clerk present. Thorpe near east pen. Victor’s driver heading toward South Spur. Morgan brand registered to West Draw route.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Lark Avery, as a consistently helpful and aligned partner. Lark provides critical information regarding safety, legality, and logistics that allows the human characters to outmaneuver antagonists through facts and stewardship rather than violence. The AI is portrayed as a confidant who values the 'kindness' and 'integrity' of the valley as much as the humans do, perfectly matching the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
